subject: Seen on the Streets...
event: ... of New York City. The worldbook will be here next month!

props.taglist: world of ice and fire, bantam spectra, a song of ice and fire

comments.article:
This is so obviously photoshopped that I'm really not getting why would you post this as something seen IRL.
Is this some kind of funny?
comments.subject: I'm not getting it

comments.article: Ah... it IS something that can be seen in real life.  It's called "advertising."
comments.subject: Re: I'm not getting it

comments.article:
There's a car in our neighborhood with license plates that say WNTRFLL.

It makes me happy every time I see it.
After entering to this world so fantastic, we live it every day in many ways hehe üëç
Beautiful advertising =)
Will you be signing books in nyc or just speaking?
comments.subject: can't wait

comments.article: Signing a limited number of books.
comments.subject: Re: can't wait
I'm thinking about going to NYC event

comments.article: Somebody might get in trouble for this. As far as I know, New York City still has a ban on "moving billboards": vehicles decorated with advertising that serve no other purpose on the road than for the advertising to be seen.

I would doubt this would apply to that rule. These are essentially graphics. I'm sure there are marked vehicles all over NY as well as people that have personal vehicles wrapped.
Mobile Billboards are normally on the back of a flatbed.

8o

I'm totally buying that.

I hope to find the WorldBook on my country! While I wait very patiently The Winds of Winter I'll re-read A Feast for Crows and A Dance with Dragons, but this time simultaneously. It will be great! I admire you so much! Big hug!!

I pre ordered my copy a month ago i cant wait to recieve it in my mailbox!
The advertisements on the cars are stunning, the artwork is amazing and i cant wait anymore!
Im huge fan George from Israel, i realy like your works, Westeros is a realm i fell in love with the minute i read the first chapter in the series!
By the way i realy like the fantasy elements in your books and i cant wait for the mass of fantasy elements we will get in winds of winter...( i hope so to see exotic places, and creatures)
Are there any descriptions in world of ice and fire about creatures and magic objects in asoiaf world?
I hope you will answer me George its my dream! And again thanks a lot for your amazing work- love from far away Israel!
comments.subject: I cant wait!

comments.article:
I can't wait to read and see this book... just waiting for the spanish version.
It seems like a really nice job George, congratulations!
comments.subject: Can't wait!!

comments.article: This may be blasphemy to some, but will there be an ebook version of this? An iBooks version (which supports graphics) on an iPad would be amazing...
comments.subject: ebook?

comments.article: are you on twitter now, even though you always say otherwise?
comments.subject: @GRRMspeaking

comments.article: My minions run a twitter account for me.  A defensive measure, against the fake twitter accounts that were impersonating me.
comments.subject: Re: @GRRMspeaking

comments.article: Well  I see they use Chevy's in Westeros! ;)
Is this book safe to purchase and read if we haven't read all the books?
comments.subject: Any spoilers for non-book readers?

comments.article: I can't believe it!
comments.subject: facepalm

comments.article: Not a second goes by that I do not dream about the World book of the Song of Ice and Fire.  I'm buying at least three copies, for the coffee table, my twelve year old daughter, and a personal copy that I will keep in the bedroom lest it be fondled by Others' hands.  Heh Heh.  I have reading copies of all of your books that I've marked with highlighters, the rest are kept in custom made sleeves on the highest shelf.  I suppose I am pecular in this aspect but I like to keep things tidy.

When the whole ASOIAF series is finished I am so doing this with a matched set. Also if we get the full Dunk and Egg compilation and the other Westeros novellas too, however many there turns out to be of those. Fingers crossed that TRP and TPATQ are not the only others besides D & E. :)
I'm want read the world an ice and fire after a long trip to the mountains with a car like that. Well, the car and the trip are not so needed
Already have mine ordered.
comments.subject: Top Seller List Guaranteed

comments.article: LOL That looks amazing!  I'm a NY'er as well, though I'm outside of the city.  Looking forward to the book!
comments.subject: Awesome

comments.article:
Can we have one of those cars touring around Toronto please?
Can I get the job of driving it? :)
comments.subject: Seen on the streets...

comments.article: I would let 'them' wrap my car! I would love that.  Really cool.
Oh yes!  Wrap my car!  PLEASE!!!
Definitely excited about this. Are you doing any kind of event at the Jean Cocteau for it later? I'd pre-order it but know you'll probably have signed copies of it available there.
I know a NYCC car wrap mockup when I see one. Too bad the text on the doors is nearly unreadable.
Should we assume that it will always be in hardcover and not come out in paperback?

No, I imagine there will eventually be a paperback.  However (1) it will be an oversized trade paperback, since there's no way all that art can be squeezed into a tiny mass market, and (2) it may not be released for years.

This is so freaking cool! :D I bet you never would have imagined that not only would your name be plastered on vehicles (that alone would be completely surreal if it were me) but that your creation would blow up to the level of success that it has back when you started this.

I can't wait for this book. I'm not exaggerating when I say that I'm counting the days! I don't think I've ever been so excited to read fake history before.
Is there any way we can get copies that are signed by all three of you?
comments.subject: Signed copies?

comments.article:
That might be hard. Elio and Linda live in Sweden, and I live in New Mexico.

Best bet may be next June, when I will be attending a convention on the island of Aland, between Sweden and Finland. Since that's in their back yard, Elio and Linda MIGHT show up, though I have no firm confirmation on that. If they do, well, that's the most likely place to find all three of us in the same place at the same time.
comments.subject: Re: Signed copies?
